name: Demolition (itch)
description:
This is nothing but a really small building demolition game I wrote.

Controls are inside.

You can make your own levels by editing the images in the levels folder. Each pixel's red value represents a different block.

  • 0, Air
  • 1, Indestructible
  • 2, Steel
  • 3, Wood
  • 4, Glass
  • 5, Concrete
  • 6, Debris
  • 7, Smoke
  • 8, Fire
